qas.question: What river is on the border of France and Germany?
The River Ill flows parallel with what river for 4 kilometres?
What kind of waterways connect the River Ill and River Rhine within Strasbourg?
Strasbourg is situated on what border of France and Germany?
What country is on the southern border of France?
What forms the western border of Strasbourg?
How far is Strasbourg from the German town Kehl?
How far downstream from Strasbourg does the River Rhine and River ILL meet?
What is a name of one of the artificial waterways in Strasbourg?

context: Strasbourg is situated on the <a3_0>eastern<a3_0/> border of France with <b4_0>Germany<b4_0/>. This border is formed by the <a0_0><b5_0>River Rhine<b5_0/><a0_0/>, which also forms the eastern border of the modern city, facing across the river to the German town Kehl. The historic core of Strasbourg however lies on the Grande Île in the <b8_0>River Ill<b8_0/>, which here flows parallel to, and roughly <b6_0>4 kilometres<b6_0/> (<b7_0>2.5 mi<b7_0/>) from, the <a1_0>Rhine<a1_0/>. The natural courses of the two rivers eventually join some distance downstream of Strasbourg, although several <a2_0>artificial<a2_0/> waterways now connect them within the city.
